text: Ottaviano Garibaldi Misefari, better known as Ottavio Misefari (1 February 1909 – 6 January 1999) was an Italian association football player and manager. In February 1925 he was the first player in history (along with Pasquale Rattotti) to move from Reggina to Messina, two rival teams in Italy (they play the "Derby dello Stretto"). Misefari was the Reggina manager during the 1944-1945 season. == References == Category:1909 births Category:1999 deaths Category:People from the Province of Reggio Calabria Category:Italian footballers Category:Italian football managers Category:Reggina 1914 managers Category:Reggina 1914 players Category:Association football forwards
title: Ottavio Misefari
